note: All schedule read paths for statistics/monitoring/calendar/capitalflow/report/debtordetail/core summaries now use App.schedulesEngine exclusively. No residual App.state.schedules/App.data.schedules reads remain in these modules.

files.statistics.engine.js: buildContext now reads schedules only from App.schedulesEngine.getAll()
files.monitoring.js: getSchedules now returns App.schedulesEngine.getAll() (or []) with no state/data fallback
files.core/data.js: recomputeDerivedLoanFields/computePortfolioSummary/getLoanSummary/getClaimSummary/loadAllFromSupabase/computeRecoveryFlowSummary/Series all use App.schedulesEngine.getAll() without state/data fallback
